amendment.description: Amendment sought to decrease funding for the Project-Based Rental Assistance Housing Program by $266,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 46 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295 to decrease funding for the Project-Based Rental Assistance Housing Program by $266,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 139 - 282 (Roll no. 452).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 139 - 282 (Roll no. 452).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A021) offered by Mr. Grothman.
